article.title: Raytheon to Repair Radar Systems
article.text: Raytheon Technical Services Co., Indianapolis, Ind., is being awarded $40,911,284 ceiling priced delivery order 7000 against previously issued basic ordering agreement (N00383-14-G-006D) for the repair of 40 weapon replaceable assemblies of the APG 65/73 radar system used in support of the F/A-18 aircraft. Naval Supply Systems Command, Weapon Systems Support, Philadelphia, Pa., is the contracting activity.
